Entries.AcceptGift_(O)308: This smells delicious! I'll eat half, and use the other half to moisturise my body...$h
Entries.8_*: A 1,000 year war between my people and the dwarfs recently ended. There's still a lot of resentment on both sides.
Entries.15_*: Please keep my location a secret. If the dwarfs knew of me, they'd surely send an assassin.
Entries.Mon2: Back again? I suppose it does fit into my theory of human behaviour.
